definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ez Eze 24:4 piece of a divided carcass (Ecclus [[נתחים]] Sir 50:12 a);—abs. ´[[נ]] Ez Eze 24:4; pl. [[נְתָחִים]] Ju. Jdg 19:29 + 2 t.; sf. [[נְתָחָיו]] Ex 29:17, Ex 29:17 + 2 t., [[נְתָחֶ֫יהָ]] Le 1:6 + 3 t.;—usu. pl. pieces: of meat in a caldron (symbol. of Jerusalem) Ez Eze 24:4; Eze 24:4 (sg. only v:Eze 24:4 b), v:Eze 24:6, v:Eze 24:6; of sacrif. animals Ex 29:17 b, Le 1:8, Le 8:20 b, Le 9:13; elsewh. ´[[לִנ]] after vb. [[נִתַּה]] (q.v.): of woman Ju Jdg 19:29 ; Ex 29:17 a, Le 1:6, Le 1:12, Le 8:20 a.
